Uses of Interface
org.cougaar.core.domain.LogicProvider

Packages that use LogicProvider
org.cougaar.core.domain This package contains the Cougaar DomainManager and LogicProvider interfaces. 
org.cougaar.core.relay This package contains the Cougaar support for "relays", which are generic blackboard objects that transfer data between agents. 
org.cougaar.planning.ldm.lps   
 

Uses of LogicProvider in org.cougaar.core.domain
 

Subinterfaces of LogicProvider in org.cougaar.core.domain
 interface ABAChangeLogicProvider
          A LogicProvider that handles community membership changes.
 interface EnvelopeLogicProvider
          A LogicProvider that handles blackboard transaction add/change/remove EnvelopeTuples.
 interface LogicProviderNeedingPersistenceEnvelopes
          A LogicProvider that needs to see PersistenceEnvelopes.
 interface MessageLogicProvider
          A LogicProvider that handles incoming Directive messages.
 interface RestartLogicProvider
          A LogicProvider that handles agent restart reconciliation.
 

Methods in org.cougaar.core.domain with parameters of type LogicProvider

          Add a LogicProvider to the set maintained for this Domain.

Uses of LogicProvider in org.cougaar.planning.ldm.lps
 

Classes in org.cougaar.planning.ldm.lps that implement LogicProvider
 class AssetTransferLP
          AssetTransferLP is a "LogPlan Logic Provider": it provides the logic to capture PlanElements that are AssetTransfers and send AssetAssignment tasks to the proper remote agent.
 class ComplainingLP
          Watch the LogPlan and complain via logging messages when obvious errors and other suspicious patterns are detected.
 class DeletionLP
          RescindLogicProvider class provides the logic to capture rescinded PlanElements (removed from collection)
 class NotificationLP
          RescindLogicProvider class provides the logic to capture rescinded PlanElements (removed from collection)
 class ReceiveAssetLP
          take an incoming AssetAssignment Directive and add Asset to the LogPlan w/side-effect of also disseminating to other subscribers.
 class ReceiveAssetRescindLP
          Catch assets so that we can relink the relationships properly.
 class ReceiveAssetVerificationLP
          take an incoming AssetVerification Directive and confirm Asset on the LogPlan w/side-effect of also disseminating to other subscribers.
 class ReceiveDeletionLP
          take an incoming Deletion Directive and perform Modification to the LOGPLAN
 class ReceiveNotificationLP
          Take an incoming Notification Directive and perform Modification to the LOGPLAN
 class ReceiveRescindLP
          take an incoming Rescind Directive and perform Modification to the LOGPLAN 1.
 class ReceiveTaskLP
          Take an incoming Task (excepting Rescind task) and add to the LogPlan w/side-effect of also disseminating to other subscribers.
 class RemoteAllocationLP
          RemoteAllocationLP class provides the logic to capture Allocations against remote agents
 class RescindLP
          RescindLogicProvider class provides the logic to capture rescinded PlanElements (removed from collection) Attempts to do a complete LogPlan rescind walk, not depending on being re-called to do the "next" level of rescind.
 class RoleScheduleConflictLP
          RoleScheduleConflictLP checks an Asset's roleschedule for potential schedule conflicts.
 class WorkflowAllocationLP
